2025.name: Peck
2025.description: Peck is a versatile robot designed for the 2025 game Reefscape, featuring a fast elevator to all the levels of the reef, an intake that can take game pieces from every angle and a climber.

2024_ios.label: 2024 IOS
2024_ios.name: Willson
2024_ios.description: Under the bumper intake, indexer and a shooter

2024.name: Toothless
2024.description: Continues elevator for climbing, for intake and outtake we had continues elevator with bottom and top rollers.

2023.name: Bolt
2023.description: Bolt combines swerve drive mobility with a retractable telescoping arm for cone placement, enhanced by a powered roller intake system.

2022.name: Pegasus
2022.description: A multi-stage telescoping arm with encoded linkage provides vertical mobility, coupled with a roller-driven floor intake system.

2020.name: Mamba
2020.description: The robot features a bumper-mounted intake feeding into a rotating indexer drum, paired with a servo-driven turret shooter for rapid field deployment.

2019.name: Venus
2019.description: Hatch Trapper: A pneumatic-powered hatch trapper. Indexer: An elevator mechanism used as an indexer

2018.name: Aeleos
2018.description: Collection System: A telescopic arm equipped with a compliant wheel intake, specifically designed for efficient and reliable collection of yellow cubes. Chassis: A tank drive chassis,

2017.name: Optimus
2017.description: Climbing System: A high-performance robot capable of scaling a 1.5-meter rope in just 3-4 seconds. Shooting System: Fires up to 4 balls per second with an impressive 80% accuracy rate, ensuring efficient scoring. Gear Collecting System: Seamlessly collects gears from the charging station and directly transfers them into the lift for smooth operation.

2016.name: Hugo
2016.description: Shooting System: A powerful catapult mechanism designed to launch objects over obstacles with precision into the opposing alliance's tower. Defense Shield: A robust shield strategically deployed to protect the teamâ€™s tower from incoming challenges.

2015.name: Moses
2015.description: Collecting System: A wheeled arm designed to efficiently gather crates with precision and ease. Lifting System: A telescopic arm, enabling smooth and reliable elevation for optimal operation

2014.name: Alpha
2014.description: Collecting System: Two sturdy sticks connected by a durable strap, ensuring efficient and reliable operation. Shooting System: Powered by precision-engineered pistons for high accuracy and performance.

2013.name: Rocky
2013.description: Cartridge frisbee storage system, Shooter frisbee firing system with horizontal wheel Climber piston powered climber
